stepAnswer: It depends on the context $$-$$ label enough to make your data understandable, without overwhelming and distracting.
stepTitle: How much labeling is the right amount?
choices: Label nothing $$-$$ you'll be there to explain it in your presentation.
Label everything $$-$$ any missing information is dishonest and confusing.
Label one data point and two axis tick marks, and nothing else.
It depends on the context $$-$$ label enough to make your data understandable, without overwhelming and distracting.
